thread.title: Eugenie Bouchard meets 'Super Bowl Twitter date' for Nets game
thread.title_full: Eugenie Bouchard meets 'Super Bowl Twitter date' for Nets game

author: Ron Clements (us-editorial@performgroup.com)
title: Eugenie Bouchard meets 'Super Bowl Twitter date' for Nets game
text:
â Genie Bouchard (@geniebouchard) February 16, 2017 
When the New England Patriots were down 28-3 to the Atlanta Falcons in Super Bowl 51, Goehrke decided to go out on a limb. 
The young marketing majorÂ shot off a tweet to Bouchard asking if she'd go on a date with him if the Patriots came back to win. 
"Sure," was the likely facetious response from the Canadian tennis pro.Â 
The Patriots made a remarkable comeback to score a 34-28 overtime victory to win the franchise's fifth Super Bowl. Immediately after the game, Bouchard tweete d to Goehrke, asking, "So... whereÂ do you live?" Omg...last night really happened... pic.twitter.com/WVxdKPYV68 â Genie Bouchard (@geniebouchard) February 6, 2017 
Say what you want about Bouchard, who is among the models featured in this month's Sports Illustrated Swimsuit edition , she's a person of integrity.Â 
As for Goehrke, clearly he took some advice from hockey great WayneÂ Gretzky:Â "You miss 100 percentÂ of the shots you don't take." Watch This
